description: Irregular table T(n, k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by rows with row polynomials P(n-1, n-1) for n > 0 with T(0, 0) = 1 where P(n, k) = (-1)^(n-k)*z^f(n-k+1)*P(n, k-1) + P(k-1, k-1) for 0 < k <= n with P(n, k) = 0 for k > n, P(n, 0) = 1 for n >= 0 and where f(2n+1) = n, f(2n) = 2n for n >= 0.
